Module.Name: CommonShield1
Module.Description: A shield battery provides a small buffer and requires little of the power grid, but it is incapable of regenerating on its own. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: UncommonShield1
Module.Description: Deflector shields provide large buffers, but low recharge rates. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: UncommonShield2
Module.Description: Null point generators provide fast recharge rates, but small buffers and at a considerable power grid cost. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: UncommonShield3
Module.Description: The safety controls of this module have been overriden, providing substantially higher regeneration rate than normal. However, the module is destroyed if the shield collapses. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: UncommonShield4
Module.Description: A shield battery provides a small buffer and requires little of the power grid, but it is incapable of regenerating on its own. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: RareShield1
Module.Description: Deflector shields provide large buffers, but low recharge rates. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: RareShield2
Module.Description: Null point generators provide fast recharge rates, but small buffers and at a considerable power grid cost. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: RareShield3
Module.Description: The safety controls of this module have been overriden, providing substantially higher regeneration rate than normal. However, the module is destroyed if the shield collapses. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: RareShield4
Module.Description: A shield battery provides a small buffer and requires little of the power grid, but it is incapable of regenerating on its own. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: ArtifactShield1
Module.Description: The 'Eve' deflector shield provides a massive buffers, but a modest recharge rate. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: ArtifactShield2
Module.Description: The 'Guardian' null point generator provides fast recharge rates, but a modest buffer and at a considerable power grid cost. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: ArtifactShield3
Module.Description: The 'Sybil' shield battery provides a massive buffer and requires little of the power grid, but it is incapable of regenerating on its own. Having multiple shield modules will cause them to operate at reduced efficiency.

Module.Name: LegendaryShield1
Module.Description: "This is where your conquest ends. This is where your empire falls."
